adrFormatAddress: 355 E 72nd St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Lindsay & Tomek for a complete home makeover, and I cannot express enough how thrilled I am with the results. From start to finish, the team exhibited a level of professionalism and creativity that exceeded my expectations.

Lindsay & Tomek possess an extraordinary talent for capturing the essence of a space and transforming it into a harmonious and aesthetically pleasing environment. They meticulously considered every detail, from color palettes to furniture selection, creating a home that perfectly reflects my style and preferences.

What truly sets 3F Living apart is their collaborative approach. The architects seamlessly integrated structural elements with the interior design, ensuring a cohesive and functional living space. Their ability to balance form and function is truly commendable.

The team kept me informed at every stage, offering insightful suggestions while respecting my vision. Their commitment to client satisfaction is evident in the flawless execution of the project. Their expertise, attention to detail, and innovative ideas were instrumental in creating a space that not only meets but exceeds my expectations.

My apartment has been transformed into my dream home, and I am grateful to the entire team at 3F Living for their exceptional work!

originalText.text: It’s been a delight to work with 3F… from conceptualisation to execution they have done an impeccable job in delivering our ask of combining 2 one bedroom apartments. Lindsay and Tomek complement each other wonderfully and are the one stop shop for refurbishments and renovations. Their vast experience and expertise helped navigate our project, through unexpected challenges due to Covid times, and amazingly, kept us on track with the projected budget spend! What differentiates them over and above their intelligent contemporary design skills, are their reliable relationships built over the years with the contractors, millworkers, building management team, independent architects and the Department of buildings. Lindsay was available to hear our suggestions and needs and incorporate them artistically. We are today enjoying our spacious apartment thanks to her ability to visualize spaces and her obsession with clean lines and perfection. Not only have we got our dream home we have also gained wonderful new friends in the 3F Living Team!!

originalText.text: 3F was a fantastic company to work with. They took my vision for my apartment and made it so much more beautiful and functional. From the paint color to the built-in cabinets to the furniture purchases, I couldn’t be happier. Everyone who comes over loves the improvements we have made. Even more than that, Lindsay and Tomek are fabulous to work with- they are kind and understanding and responsive. My home is so much better because of their guidance. I highly recommend 3F living to help with any renovations and upgrades.

originalText.text: Working with 3F was fantastic! From planning, designing, and the execution of it all - it was such a great process. I now get to live in the apartment of my dreams. Waking up and seeing how beautiful everything is never gets old. My favorite part is the custom millwork that maximizes every inch of the space. Would absolutely recommend working with 3F living!

text.text: Working with 3F was fantastic! From planning, designing, and the execution of it all - it was such a great process. I now get to live in the apartment of my dreams. Waking up and seeing how beautiful everything is never gets old. My favorite part is the custom millwork that maximizes every inch of the space. Would absolutely recommend working with 3F living!

originalText.text: Lindsay was referred to me by my real estate agent and after the first time I met her, I knew she would be the person I trusted with the job. She handled both the renovations and interior design for my new apartment and despite the ongoing pandemic and the restrictions that came along with it, she and her team persevered and exceeded my expectations from start to finish. Lindsay transformed my apartment into a comfortable and beautiful haven and I couldn't be happier.
